_comment: Example configuration keys read by config.py
description: This file documents the environment variables used by the ReAct Pattern Implementation

required_keys.OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key for LLM access (required for agent functionality)

optional_keys.PINECONE_API_KEY: Pinecone API key for vector search (Level 1 integration)
optional_keys.FALLBACK_TO_STATIC: Fallback to static pipeline on errors (default: true)
